data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Since ____ randomization-based ____ is ____ and ____ closely ____ by ____ approach ____ a ____ linear ____, ____ teachers ____ the ____ linear ____ approach. Few statisticians object to model-based analysis of balanced randomized experiments.
data.partBlankContent: The randomization-based analysis has the disadvantage that its exposition involves tedious algebra and extensive time. Since t__ randomization-based anal____ is compl______ and i_ closely approx______ by t__ approach us___ a nor___ linear mo___, mo__ teachers emph_____ the nor___ linear mo___ approach. Few statisticians object to model-based analysis of balanced randomized experiments.
data.answer: 基于随机化分析的缺点是它的阐述涉及繁琐的代数和大量的时间。由于基于随机化的分析比较复杂，且采用常规线性模型的方法较为接近，所以大多数教师都强调采用常规线性模型的方法。很少有统计学家反对基于模型的平衡随机实验分析。
